properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 9:32PM EST until February 15 at 12:08AM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Tennessee...

French Broad River Near Newport TN affecting Cocke and Jefferson
Counties.

South Chickamauga Creek Near Chickamauga TN affecting Hamilton
County.

Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County.

Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Sequatchie, Bledsoe
and Marion Counties.

For the French Broad River...including Newport TN...Minor flooding
is forecast.
For the South Chickamauga...including Chickamauga TN...Minor
flooding is forecast.
For the Pigeon River...including Newport TN...Minor flooding is
forecast.
For the Sequatchie River...including Whitwell TN...Minor flooding is
forecast.

The Flood Warning continues for
the South Chickamauga Creek Near Chickamauga TN.
* Until late Friday night.
* At 8:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 18.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late
tonight.
* Impact...At 18.0 feet, Water begins to cross Mack Smith Road in
Catoosa County, Georgia. Flooding begins at golf courses near the
confluence of South and West Chickamauga Creeks. West Chickamauga
Creek begins to overflow its banks, as well.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 815 AM EST. 715
AM CST.

NWSheadline: The Flood Warning remains in effect
